Module applications
Package applications.console_application

Class MetroStationWithCollection

java.lang.Object
applications.console_application.AbstractMetroStation
applications.console_application.MetroStationWithCollection
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationWithList
public abstract class MetroStationWithCollection extends AbstractMetroStation
An abstract class MetroStationWithCollection representing a Metro Station with a collection of operating hours. Extends the AbstractMetroStation class.
